TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
Join Condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: FOLDER1 = FOLDER AND WORKFLOW1 = WORKFLOW AND SESSION_NAME1 = SESSION_NAME

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT ETLMGR.SEQ_ETL_RUN_LOG.NEXTVAL, FOLDER, WORKFLOW, SESSION_NAME, TARGET_OWNER, TARGET_TABLE, INCR_START_VALUE, INCR_END_VALUE FROM ETLMGR.ETL_INCR_PARAM WHERE FOLDER = '$PMFolderName' and WORKFLOW = '$PMWorkflowName' and SESSION_NAME = '$$SESSION_NAME'

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: -- create view v_REP_SESS_LOG as select * from REP_SESS_LOG -- select * from v_REP_SESS_LOG -- grant select on v_REP_SESS_LOG to domaindb SELECT s_log.SUBJECT_AREA AS FOLDER, s_log.WORKFLOW_NAME AS WORKFLOW , s_log.SESSION_NAME , s_log.ACTUAL_START as start_time, s_log.SESSION_TIMESTAMP end_time, CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 1 THEN 'Succeeded' ELSE CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 2 THEN 'Disabled' ELSE CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 3 THEN 'Failed' ELSE CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 4 THEN 'Stopped' ELSE CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 5 THEN 'Aborted' ELSE CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 6 THEN 'Running' ELSE CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 7 THEN 'Suspending' ELSE CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 8 THEN 'Suspended' ELSE CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 9 THEN 'Stopping' ELSE CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 10 THEN 'Aborting' ELSE CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 11 THEN 'Waiting' ELSE CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 12 THEN 'Scheduled' ELSE CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 13 THEN 'UnScheduled' ELSE CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 14 THEN 'Unknown' ELSE CASE WHEN s_log.RUN_STATUS_CODE = 15 THEN 'Terminated' ELSE NULL END END END END END END END END END END END END END END END as status, s_log.SUCCESSFUL_SOURCE_ROWS as source_successful_rows, s_log.FAILED_SOURCE_ROWS as source_failed_rows, s_log.SUCCESSFUL_ROWS as target_successful_rows, s_log.FAILED_ROWS as target_failed_rows, s_log.FIRST_ERROR_CODE, s_log.FIRST_ERROR_MSG FROM REP_SESS_LOG s_log WHERE 1=1 and s_log.SUBJECT_AREA = '$PMFolderName' and s_log.WORKFLOW_NAME = '$PMWorkflowName' and s_log.SESSION_NAME = '$$SESSION_NAME' and s_log.ACTUAL_START = (SELECT MAX (ACTUAL_START) FROM REP_SESS_LOG s_log WHERE s_log.SUBJECT_AREA = '$PMFolderName' and s_log.WORKFLOW_NAME = '$PMWorkflowName' and s_log.SESSION_NAME = '$$SESSION_NAME')
